menu.title: Filtered Pancake
menu.desc: Experience the taste of milk in buttermilk pancakes! Start your day with our soft-textured filtered pancakes.

menu.title: Diner Double Burger
menu.desc: Our diner-style double burger is a perfect choice for your lunch with its delicious taste and filling structure!

menu.title: Godzilla Milkshake
menu.desc: A legendary taste awaits you! Indulge yourself with our Godzilla Milkshake and take a sweet break.

menu.title: Village Delight
menu.desc: The indispensable taste of village breakfasts is now here! Village Delight breakfast, prepared with entirely natural ingredients, invites you to a delicious feast.

menu.title: Egg Attack
menu.desc: Experience the taste of village breakfasts! Egg Attack, prepared with entirely natural ingredients, offers a delightful taste journey.

menu.title: Oreo Dream
menu.desc: A fantastic treat for Oreo lovers! Oreo Dream takes you to a world of sweetness. It's irresistible!

menu.title: Bacon Wave
menu.desc: A must-have for bacon lovers! With plenty of freshly fried bacon and other delights, Bacon Wave ensures a fantastic start to your day.

menu.title: American Classic
menu.desc: Experience an unforgettable meal with the classic tastes of American cuisine. Plus, it's a favorite due to its affordable price!

menu.title: Quarantine Buddy
menu.desc: A delicious milkshake that won't leave you alone on quarantine days! Take a sweet escape with Quarantine Buddy.

menu.title: Bison Steak
menu.desc: The unique taste of bison meat combines with special spices and sauces. Bison Steak is a perfect choice for your dinner!

menu.title: Tropical Paradise
menu.desc: A blend of tropical fruits that takes you to a paradise island. Perfect for hot summer days!

menu.title: Farmhouse Omelette
menu.desc: Filled with fresh vegetables and cheese, this omelette will remind you of the countryside mornings.
